original: dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo; ;'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo; ;'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Saṅgha! Homage to the noble Avalokiteśvara, the bodhisattva mahāsattva!

original: de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di 'dzin gyi /
analyzed: de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di 'dzin gyi /
translated: Having paid homage to them, may this knowledge be upheld.

original: rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig /
analyzed: rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig /
translated: May this knowledge be accomplished for me.

original: tadya th'a / ha na ha na s'a ne /
analyzed: tadya th'a / ha na ha na s'a ne /

original: na ba s'a ne /🔽dzva la dzva la ne /
analyzed: na ba s'a ne / dzva la dzva la ne /

original: p'urba yo ga ma nu sma ra phat/
analyzed: p'urba yo ga ma nu sma ra phat/

original: gang @9b gis rig pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgyad stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang @9b gis rig pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgyad stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
translated: Whoever reads this knowledge will remember their births for eight thousand lifetimes.

original: 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ldan gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ldan gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And after passing away from here, they will be reborn in the world of Sukhāvatī.

original: bde ldan gyi snying po rdzogs so;;
analyzed: bde ldan gyi snying po rdzogs so;;
translated: The Essence of Sukhāvatī is complete.
